content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, nice to meet you. Let's start with the rental price. What is your offer? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I am interested in the lowest price that fits within my budget. I am prepared to pay a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's very close to all important facilities, which is a big plus for me. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Given your budget, I am asking for €1,500 per month. I am sure you understand that the location and condition of the apartment justify this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your asking price is higher than what I am prepared to pay. I am looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment but also takes into account my student status. Can we negotiate a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am willing to consider a lower price, but I must remind you that the location and condition of the apartment are quite desirable. How much are you prepared to pay? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am prepared to offer €1,200 per month for the apartment, Mister Schmidt. I believe this is a fair price considering the apartment's location and condition. I am a smart and responsible student who values a good relationship with my landlord.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but €1,200 per month is too low for this apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but I must receive a higher offer. Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Could you provide me with a price that you are willing to accept, considering my offer of €1,200 per month? I am open to adjusting my offer if it is not in line with your expectations.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am willing to accept €1,400 per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price given the location and condition of the apartment. If you are not willing to pay this price, I am open to considering lower offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your price of €1,400 per month is closer to my budget, but I am still looking for a lower price. I value the apartment's location and condition, but as a student, I am seeking a price that is both fair and affordable. Would you be willing to go lower?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, but €1,400 per month is the lowest I am willing to go for this apartment. I believe this is a fair price given the location and condition of the apartment. If you are not willing to pay this price, I am open to considering lower offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
